title: Conversational, plain-English helper text in Ask Krishna chat thread

requirements.summary: Make the chat thread “no verse available” helper text plain English (no emojis) and consistent with the new conversational tone.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/chat/ChatThread.tsx`, the "no verse" hint text renders as plain English without emojis and remains a single concise sentence.
No other user-facing text changes introduce non-English phrasing or emoji-only indicators in the chat thread.

file_operations.description: Replace the current emoji-prefixed “no verse” hint text with a single concise plain-English sentence (no emojis) that matches the updated conversational tone when no verse is available, without changing other chat-thread user-facing strings.
